text:
Tomorrow the ABM Leadership Alliance is hosting a virtual event all about evolving account-based marketing strategies to adapt to the times we’re all living and working in now. There will be a number of keynotes and case study sessions, which feature real ABM practitioners sharing their strategies. If ABM is on your list of things to learn more about, I encourage you to sign up here: <https://pathfac.to/3f4ylc2>

_Full disclosure: My company (PathFactory) is a co-organizer._

attachments.title: The New Normal - Virtual Event - Account-Based Marketing Leadership Alliance
attachments.text: Join the ABM Leadership Alliance on June 17th for our virtual summit focused on integrating advanced ABM strategies and tactics into your plan for successfully navigating our new normal
attachments.fallback: Account-Based Marketing Leadership Alliance: The New Normal - Virtual Event - Account-Based Marketing Leadership Alliance
